asgn2Exceptions

Class CustomerException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • asgn2Exceptions.CustomerException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CustomerException
extends java.lang.Exception
    A class that represents exceptions related to the construction and handling of Customer objects.
    Author:
    Alan Woodley
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomerException()
      Produces a CustomerException

      Produces a CustomerException with the specified message
      CustomerException(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Produces a CustomerException with the specified message and cause
      CustomerException(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable cause, boolean enableSuppression, boolean writableStackTrace)
      Produces a CustomerException with the specified message, cause and flags to enable suppression and make the stack trace writable

      Produces a CustomerException with the specified cause

      • CustomerException

        public CustomerException(java.lang.String message,
                         java.lang.Throwable cause,
                         boolean enableSuppression,
                         boolean writableStackTrace)
        Produces a CustomerException with the specified message, cause and flags to enable suppression and make the stack trace writable
        Parameters:
        cause - - The exception's cause
        message - - The exception's message
        enableSuppression - - A flag to indicate if suppression should be enabled or disabled
        writableStackTrace - - A flag to indicate if the stacktrace should be writable or not
